question: Which among the following is / are the main objective(s) of National Green Corps ?
option1: Educate youngsters about environment and eco-systems
option2: Prosecute and Punish the violators of Environment laws
answer: Educate youngsters about environment and eco-systems
explanation: National Green Corps is a programme of the Ministry of Environment and Forests of Government of India which aims at promoting environmental activity in schools in India. The motto of the initiative is "Where there is Green, there is Prosperity".
